skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Embalmed in Elixir
skillTree.description: The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.

skillTree.name: Incantation of Preservation
skillTree.description: When intoned, this ritual text holds back decay so the Tomb Kings' souls can be bound to their mortal remains once more.

effects.description:
[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Keeper of Lore
skillTree.description: There are specialised rituals, chants and incantations for drawing forth dead spirits and binding them back into their corporeal forms; this one knows them all.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Mortuary Cultist
skillTree.description: Knowing your way around the Realm of Souls, along with knowledge of the required ritual incantations, are essential skills for the dedicated Liche Priest.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Poison Spray
skillTree.description: A toxic spray of acid jets forth from the spine of Tomb Scorpion's tail.

skillTree.name: Annointing of Tahoth
skillTree.description: When freed of the burden of his entombed body, the spirit of Serkhet is free to commune with those around him, carrying forth the wisdom of Tahoth.

skillTree.name: Damnation of Sokth and Tahoth
skillTree.description: The patron deities of Serkhet have taken a healthy interest in him, and woe betide any who should cross their desired fate for the Entombed One.

skillTree.name: Beloved of the Scorpion God
skillTree.description: Returned from the grave as a scorpion, Serkhet has forever after been blessed by the Scorpion God.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +6 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Pincer Strike
skillTree.description: The pincers of Serkhet glow with the magic of Nehekhara, increasing their vicious and penetrating power.

skillTree.name: Absolution of Sokth
skillTree.description: Blessed from beyond the grave by Sokth, Serkhet summons his power whenever the battle lust of the Tomb Scorpion is not upon him.

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: Bound Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance
skillTree.description: As the names of Usirian are invoked, skeletal hands burst forth from beneath the sand to drag the foe to their graves.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Bound Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades
skillTree.description: Imbued with the essence of the God of Death, the Nehekharans' blades strike with supernatural force to harvest souls for Djaf.

effects.description: Ability: "Bound Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades"

unit_ability.description: Bound Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades

skillTree.name: Bound Neru's Incantation of Protection
skillTree.description: Sword-blows are mysteriously turned away as Ptra's wife reaches out to shield Nehekhara's warriors from evil.

skillTree.name: Bound Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting
skillTree.description: When the verses are spoken, a fierce light emanates from the Undead's empty eye-sockets, enabling them to strike with supernatural speed and fury.

effects.description: Ability: "Bound Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting"

unit_ability.description: Bound Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting

skillTree.name: Bound Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm
skillTree.description: A whirlwind of skulls tears across the battlefield, devouring all in its path in the Goddess of the Green Moon's bitter, vindictive name.

effects.description: Ability: "Bound Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm"

unit_ability.description: Bound Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm

skillTree.name: Bound Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation
skillTree.description: Every syllable strips moisture and saps vitality from the bodies of Usekhp's unfortunate victims.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

backgroundSkills.name: Entombed Priest
backgroundSkills.description: "None can stand before the Servant of the Sands."

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Liche Priests
	(factionwide)
